title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1156.5 - Requests for access to records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1156.5 - Requests for access to records

State Regulations
(a) Requests for access to records of the

Niagara Frontier Transportation Authority and/or any subsidiary corporations
shall be in writing and addressed to: Records Access Officer

Niagara Frontier Transportation Authority

Buffalo, N.Y. 14203
or made by e-mail in the format provided at
www.nfta.com. Requests shall reasonably describe the record or records
sought. Whenever possible a person requesting records should supply information
regarding dates, file designations or other information that may help to
describe the records sought. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1156.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
